attributes.additional_details: Why should we pay for something that we have no control over? Women can’t live their normal lives without spending money for a necessity. Results revealed the average woman spends £10.24 a month on menstrual products. That adds up to £4,916 in an average woman's reproductive lifetime – between the ages of 12 and 52. This is a cost not everybody can afford, so it is important that we take action!
attributes.background: Make Sanitary products free for all Women.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:  

Fund Free Period Products - it is not a LUXURY: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599377
